news_header: Israel struck Hezbollah sites despite a ceasefire.
news_original_title: Lebanon ceasefire: Israel strikes target Hezbollah sites
news_text: Israel announced that its forces targeted two sites in Lebanon allegedly containing Hezbollah weapons, violating a ceasefire agreement. The conflict between Israel and Hezbollah intensified after Hamas attacked Israel on October 8, 2023. A truce was agreed upon in November 2024 after 13 months of fighting, with both sides accusing each other of violations. The White House extended the truce until February 18.
